label: 八幡宮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Any shrine built in honor of Hachiman-no-Kami. The three famous ones were the Usa-Hachiman-gū, the Iwashimizu-no-Hachiman-gū, and the Tsurugaoka-Hachiman-gū. Refer- Kagoshima-no-jingū. [八幡神、宇佐八幡宮、石清水八幡宮、鶴ヶ岡八幡宮、鹿児島神宮]
